short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight, annotate, and organize web content seamlessly with Taggii. Boost productivity today!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Taggii is a powerful extension that enhances your browsing experience by allowing you to highlight, take notes, and organize web content (text, images, code blocks, etc.) directly from any webpage.

Whether you're a student, researcher, content creator, or professional, Taggii makes it easy to manage your web content effectively. You can use our Taggii application to sync your highlights and notes across devices, ensuring you can access your content anytime, anywhere. With a built-in reader mode, you can keep reading inside our application and highlight even when there is no desktop browser available.

🌟🌟🌟Key Features🌟🌟🌟

🌐 Highlight websites (text for now, images, code blocks, and more coming soon)

📕 Highlight PDFs (upcoming)

✍️ Take notes for your highlights

👨‍💻 Reader mode in browser(upcoming)

🔄 Cloud sync

📤 Export to Notion, and more(upcoming)

🏆🏆🏆Why Choose Taggii?🏆🏆🏆

▪︎ Cross-Device Access: Access your highlights and notes seamlessly across all your devices.

▪︎ User-Friendly Interface: Designed to be intuitive and easy to use, Taggii helps you manage your content without hassle.

▪︎ Stay Organized: Keep track of your research, ideas, and important information in one place.

▪︎ Boost Productivity: Save time and effort by having all your tagged content organized and accessible whenever you need it.

▪︎ Always Free: Enjoy most of our features for free, with premium options available for advanced functionalities.

▪︎ Responsive Support: We're a small startup dedicated to listening to our users and continuously improving Taggii based on your feedback.

❤️❤️❤️Support and Feedback❤️❤️❤️

We value your feedback and are here to help. 

If you have any questions or suggestions, please reach out to us at [contact@taggii.com](mailto:contact@taggii.com). 

You can also join our community on Discord for real-time support and discussions: https://discord.gg/F3jUPtpzd8
